at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common.communication

Class MessageSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common.communication.MessageSender

  • class MessageSender
extends java.lang.Object
    This class transforms a method interface into message objects and sends the message objects to the communication partner.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Connection connection 
      private static java.util.logging.Logger logger 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MessageSender()
      Initialize an instance with no communication partner assigned.
      MessageSender(Connection c)
      Initialize an instance and assigns a connection to it.

                    boolean isHardwareBuffer,

             throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a "bufferMetaInfo" message to the communication partner.

        bufferName - the name of the buffer
        isHardwareBuffer - represents this buffer a hardware port and cannot be modified or deleted

        java.io.IOException - if the send operation fails
